EmailTemplate.name: PREPARE Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: You're training is coming up!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your training is coming up! {!CampaignMember.FirstName}, {!CampaignMember.Training_Name__c} is almost here. Details are below! When: {!CampaignMember.Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.Training_End_DateTime__c} Where: {!CampaignMember.C501_Training_Location_Text__c} Food Provided: {!CampaignMember.Meal_Provided__c} Please let us know if you won't be able to make it so we can let another provider take the class. Call us at 206-682-6704 or email prepareforcare@501commons.org. See you soon! -The 501 Commons www.501commons.org ¡Su entrenamiento se acerca!{!CampaignMember.FirstName}, {!CampaignMember.Training_Name_c} ya casi está aquí. Cuando: {!CampaignMember.Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.Training_End_DateTime__c} Dirección: !CampaignMember.Training_Location__c} Comida provista: {!CampaignMember.Meal_Provided__c} Si no puede asistir, favor de avisarnos tan pronto como posible. ¿Preguntas? Contáctenos al 206-682-6704 o prepareforcare@501commons.org. -The 501 Commons www.501commons.org
{!$Setup.Imagine_Settings__c.Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
